write-mode.name: delete_set
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label

write-mode.name: add_to_set_el3
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnSet (user_id, label, element, element_two, element_three) VALUES (:user_id, :label, :el_one, :el_two, :el_three)

write-mode.name: add_to_set_el2
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnSet (user_id, label, element, element_two) VALUES (:user_id, :label, :el_one, :el_two)

write-mode.name: add_to_set_el1
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnSet (user_id, label, element) VALUES (:user_id, :label, :el_one)

write-mode.name: delete_from_set_el3
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label AND element = :el_one AND element_two = :el_two AND element_three = :el_three

write-mode.name: delete_from_set_el2
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label AND element = :el_one AND element_two = :el_two

write-mode.name: delete_from_set_el1
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label AND element = :el_one AND element_two is null

mode.name: lookup_set
mode.query: SELECT user_id, label, element, element_two, element_three FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label

write-mode.name: remove_illegal_servers
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE USP.user_id = S.user_id AND USP.server_id = S.element) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = S.element AND SFV.label = 'ftr_system_grouping'))

write-mode.name: remove_illegal_errata
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnOrgErrata OE WHERE OE.org_id = :org_id AND OE.errata_id = S.element)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_servers
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE USP.user_id = S.user_id AND USP.server_id = S.element)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_virtual_servers
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerPerms USP, rhnVirtualInstance VI WHERE USP.user_id = S.user_id AND VI.id = S.element AND ( USP.server_id = VI.host_system_id OR USP.server_id = VI.virtual_system_id ) )

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_probes
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhn_check_probe CP, rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE CP.probe_id = S.element AND USP.user_id = S.user_id AND CP.host_id = USP.server_id)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_actions
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerAction SA WHERE SA.action_id = S.element AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE USP.user_id = S.user_id AND USP.server_id = SA.server_id) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerHistory SH WHERE SH.id = S.element AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserServerPerms USP WHERE USP.user_id = S.user_id AND USP.server_id = SH.server_id))

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_channels
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserChannel UAC WHERE UAC.user_id = S.user_id AND UAC.channel_id = S.element)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_errata
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE rowid IN(SELECT s.rowid FROM rhnSet S, web_contact WC WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.user_id = WC.id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnErrata E WHERE E.id = S.element AND E.org_id = WC.org_id ) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnErrataTmp ET WHERE ET.id = S.element AND ET.org_id = WC.org_id ) ) )

write-mode.name: remove_nonrhn_unowned_errata
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE rowid IN(SELECT s.rowid FROM rhnSet S, web_contact WC WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.user_id = WC.id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnErrata E WHERE E.id = S.element AND (E.org_id = WC.org_id OR E.org_id IS NULL) ) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnErrataTmp ET WHERE ET.id = S.element AND ET.org_id = WC.org_id ) ) )

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_system_profiles
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerProfile SP, web_contact WC WHERE SP.org_id = WC.org_id AND WC.user_id = S.user_id AND SP.id = S.element)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_packages
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE rowid IN(SELECT s.rowid FROM rhnSet S, web_contact WC, rhnPackage P WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.user_id = WC.id AND S.label = :label AND S.element = P.id AND (P.org_id != WC.org_id AND P.id NOT IN (SELECT CP.package_id FROM rhnChannelPackage CP, rhnAvailableChannels AC WHERE AC.org_id = wc.org_id AND AC.channel_id = CP.channel_id )) )

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_kickstart_scripts
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE 1=1 AND S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM rhnkickstartscript KS, rhnuser U, rhnksdata KD WHERE 1=1 AND KS.id = S.element AND KS.kickstart_id = KD.id AND S.user_id = U.id AND U.org_id = KD.org_id)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_users
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM web_contact WC, web_contact WC_TARGET WHERE WC.id = S.user_id AND WC_TARGET.id = S.element AND WC.org_id = WC_TARGET.org_id)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_system_groups
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerGroup SG WHERE SG.id = S.element AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserGroup UG, rhnUserGroupType UGT, rhnUserGroupMembers UGM WHERE UGM.user_id = S.user_id AND UG.id = UGM.user_group_id AND UGT.id = UG.group_type AND (UGT.label = 'org_admin' OR UGT.label = 'system_group_admin') AND SG.org_id = UG.org_id ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM rhnUserManagedServerGroups UMSG WHERE UMSG.user_id = S.user_id AND UMSG.server_group_id = SG.id ) ) )

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_filters
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhn_redirects R, web_contact WC where WC.id = S.user_id AND WC.org_id = R.customer_id AND S.element = R.recid)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_suites
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rhn_check_suites CS, web_contact WC where WC.id = S.user_id AND WC.org_id = CS.customer_id AND S.element = CS.recid)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_activation_keys
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM web_contact WC, rhnRegToken RT WHERE WC.id = S.user_id AND RT.id = S.element AND WC.org_id = RT.org_id)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_gpgssl_keys
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM web_contact WC, rhnCryptoKey CK WHERE WC.id = S.user_id AND CK.id = S.element AND WC.org_id = CK.org_id)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_file_list
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM web_contact WC, rhnFileList FL WHERE WC.id = S.user_id AND FL.id = S.element AND WC.org_id = FL.org_id)

write-mode.name: remove_unowned_package_profiles
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM web_contact WC, rhnServerProfile SP WHERE WC.id = S.user_id AND SP.id = S.element AND WC.org_id = SP.org_id)

write-mode.name: remove_inaccessible_config_revs
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND rhn_config_channel.get_user_revision_access(S.element, :user_id) = 0

write-mode.name: remove_inaccessible_config_files
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND rhn_config_channel.get_user_file_access(S.element, :user_id) = 0

write-mode.name: remove_inaccessible_config_channels
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet S WHERE S.user_id = :user_id AND S.label = :label AND rhn_config_channel.get_user_chan_access(S.element, :user_id) = 0
